about_the_game:
Shifter is a minimalist and atmospheric puzzle experience that will challenge your spatial reasoning and problem-solving skills. In this unique puzzle-box adventure, you control a shifting square that moves continuously in a chosen direction until it hits an obstacle. Your goal? Find the perfect path to the exit.

With 60 handcrafted levels spread across six distinct zones, Shifter introduces a variety of mechanics that keep gameplay fresh and engaging. Navigate through teleporters, activate moving walls, avoid deadly spikes, and discover even more surprises along the way. Each zone presents new challenges, encouraging players to think ahead, experiment, and refine their strategy.

Features

🔹 Minimalist Aesthetic – A clean and atmospheric design that keeps the focus on the puzzles.
🔹 Unique Puzzle Mechanics – Master teleporters, shifting walls, spikes, and more.
🔹 60 Handcrafted Levels – A carefully curated difficulty curve with satisfying solutions.
🔹 Relaxing Yet Challenging – No timers, no pressure—just pure puzzle-solving satisfaction.
🔹 Immersive Sound Design – A subtle, atmospheric soundtrack that enhances the experience.

If you love clever puzzle games that require foresight and experimentation, Shifter will keep you thinking from start to finish. Can you find the right path through every level and escape the puzzle box?
